content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":135375,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/e3b0a5eb-66b9-4fe1-b0a7-352800ae951c/slide.PNG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/e3b0a5eb-66b9-4fe1-b0a7-352800ae951c/slide.PNG?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"slide.PNG\",\"name\":\"slide.PNG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"e3b0a5eb-66b9-4fe1-b0a7-352800ae951c\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":876,\"height\":451},\"extension\":\"PNG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"We do understand that we are in a different context now, we have different personalities, we are from different cultures. \\u000bAnd we should respect our differences! üßîüë≥üë©‚ÄçüöÄüëΩüßô‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"note-quote\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Still, we DO work at one international company with policies and rules. \\r\\nAnd we kindly ask you to turn ON your cameras as a must in meetings with our Client, \\rand nice to have - in your regular team meetings\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\nWhy are we asking about cameras ON?\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":43839,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/1d1ad1c5-a3e9-42bf-8ecd-0e0c746b4f20/slide 3.PNG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/1d1ad1c5-a3e9-42bf-8ecd-0e0c746b4f20/slide 3.PNG?preview=true\",\"fileName\":\"slide 3.PNG\",\"name\":\"slide 3.PNG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"1d1ad1c5-a3e9-42bf-8ecd-0e0c746b4f20\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":1029,\"height\":435.58354755784063},\"extension\":\"PNG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{\"size\":45260,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/5ff9dd79-a3a7-405e-ba52-bd9c9cc7a783/slide 2.PNG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/5ff9dd79-a3a7-405e-ba52-bd9c9cc7a783/slide 2.PNG?preview=true\",\"fileName\":\"slide 2.PNG\",\"name\":\"slide 2.PNG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"5ff9dd79-a3a7-405e-ba52-bd9c9cc7a783\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":1029,\"height\":465.08474576271186},\"extension\":\"PNG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Let‚Äôs Play! Please Match a Concern with a Possible Solution üòÉ:\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":63263,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/87db1883-e3c7-498a-9783-08f65884f0f6/slide 4.PNG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/87db1883-e3c7-498a-9783-08f65884f0f6/slide 4.PNG?preview=true\",\"fileName\":\"slide 4.PNG\",\"name\":\"slide 4.PNG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"87db1883-e3c7-498a-9783-08f65884f0f6\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":1029,\"height\":425.5263157894737},\"extension\":\"PNG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\n\\n\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Thank you for turning your camera ON and helping us build sustainable and trustful relations with the client and the team!\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
